column1: Little Goat Diner////We were getting hungry late on a Friday night and took a stroll down to the West Loop to find some good late night eats. After finding out Grange Hall's kitchen was closed we just took a shot at Little Goat. Usually when passing by Little Goat I've come to just assume the wait is longer than I'm willing to deal with
column2: but surprisingly we were seated immediately. I guess 11PM is a sweet spot.
